title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid personal and business information, and is assigned USER role by default.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Fill in all required personal and business information fields with valid data.
Submit the registration form.
Verify the user is registered successfully, receives USER role, and is redirected to the dashboard.

title: User Registration Fails on Missing Required Fields
description: Verify the system prevents registration when required fields are missing and displays validation errors.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Submit the registration form with missing personal or business information.
Verify the system displays appropriate validation error messages and prevents form submission.

title: Login Success with Correct Credentials
description: Check login is successful when using valid email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input a registered email and correct password.
Click the login button.
Verify user is authenticated, session is created, and redirected to their dashboard.

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Check login fails when incorrect email or password is provided and appropriate error is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input a registered email with incorrect password.
Click the login button.
Verify the login attempt is rejected and a meaningful error message is displayed.

title: Role-Based Access Control for Admin and User
description: Verify access restrictions: Admin can access admin panel, Users cannot; Users can access user dashboard, Admins can also access user areas.

steps.description: Login as Admin user.
Verify Admin access to admin panel pages and user dashboard pages.
Login as User role.
Verify User can access user dashboard but is denied access to admin panel pages.

title: Browse Products with Category Filtering
description: Verify users can browse listed products and filter by categories with correct resulting products displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the product catalog page.
Select a product category filter.
Verify only products within the selected category are displayed with correct information and demo credentials.

title: View Product Details and Plans
description: Verify detailed product pages display correct information including available plans, descriptions, and demo credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to a product detail page from the catalog.
Verify product name, description, available plans (monthly, yearly, lifetime), and demo credentials are shown.

title: Pricing Page Plan Comparison Display
description: Verify the pricing page displays plan comparison table with monthly, yearly, and lifetime pricing options.

steps.description: Navigate to the pricing page.
Confirm the plan comparison table is visible showing correct prices for all plans across all durations.

title: Start Free 7-Day Trial Successfully
description: Verify that a logged-in user can start a free trial for a product if no active trial exists, and the trial status is set correctly.

steps.description: Login as a user without an active trial for a selected product.
Navigate to product detail page and click 'Start Trial' button.
Verify a new 7-day trial is created with status active and reflected in the user dashboard.

title: Prevent Starting Multiple Active Trials for Same Product
description: Verify the system prevents starting a new trial for a product if the user already has an active trial for that product.

steps.description: Login as a user with an active trial for a product.
Attempt to start another trial for the same product.
Verify the system rejects the request and displays an appropriate error message.

title: Automatic Trial Expiration After 7 Days
description: Verify that trials automatically transition from active to expired after 7 days and are updated in the user dashboard.

steps.description: Create a trial starting 7 days ago for a user.
Verify the trial status is updated to expired and user dashboard reflects this change accurately.

title: Subscription Creation and Status Tracking
description: Verify users can create subscriptions from active trials or directly and subscription statuses (active, cancelled, expired) update correctly.

steps.description: Login as a user with an active trial.
Create subscription for the trial product.
Verify subscription is created with active status and visible in billing history.
Cancel the subscription.
Verify subscription status updates to cancelled and reflected in the user dashboard.

title: Access Billing History
description: Verify users can view complete billing history for their subscriptions with correct data shown.

steps.description: Login as a user with previous subscriptions.
Navigate to billing history page in dashboard.
Verify historical billing records are displayed with correct statuses, dates, and amounts.

title: Initiate Payment Using PayTR Gateway
description: Verify payment initiation endpoint integrates correctly with PayTR and redirects user to payment page.

steps.description: Initiate payment for a subscription via the payment initiation endpoint.
Verify the system sends correct data to PayTR, receives valid payment link, and user is redirected properly.

title: Handle PayTR Payment Callback Success
description: Verify payment callback updates payment and subscription statuses accurately upon successful payment.

steps.description: Simulate PayTR payment success callback with correct parameters.
Verify payment record status is updated to successful and subscription status is updated accordingly.

title: Handle PayTR Payment Callback Failure
description: Verify system correctly handles failed payment callbacks by marking payment as failed and notifying user.

steps.description: Simulate PayTR payment failure callback.
Verify payment record is marked as failed; subscription remains unaffected or appropriately updated; user is notified.

title: User Dashboard Displays Overview Stats Correctly
description: Verify user dashboard shows accurate statistics for active trials, subscriptions, and billing information.

steps.description: Login as a user with various trials and subscriptions.
Verify that dashboard stats cards display correct counts and statuses.

title: Admin Panel User Management Functions
description: Verify admin can view, filter, and manage users, including role changes and status updates.

steps.description: Login as an admin.
Navigate to user management section.
Filter users by role or status.
Modify user roles and save changes.
Verify changes persist and are reflected immediately in the admin UI.

title: Admin Panel Product and Trial Management
description: Verify admin can add, edit, delete products and manage trials including status verification.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to product management.
Add a new product with valid details.
Verify product appears in product list and is available in public catalog.
Navigate to trial management and verify trial statuses are accurate.

title: Admin Panel Subscription and Payment Analytics
description: Verify admin can view subscriptions and payment records with correct filters and summary analytics.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to subscriptions and payments sections.
Apply filters such as date range, status, and user.
Verify filtered results are correct and analytics summaries are updated accordingly.

title: WhatsApp Support Button Display and Messaging
description: Verify the floating WhatsApp support button is visible on all pages, with dynamic messaging reflecting current page context.

steps.description: Navigate to various pages: landing, product detail, dashboard, admin panel.
Confirm WhatsApp button is present on all pages and clicking it opens WhatsApp with the correct dynamic message and phone number.

title: Responsive Navigation Components
description: Verify the navbar and footer adapt layout according to screen size and authentication state.

steps.description: Access the application on desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes.
Verify navbar and footer adjust responsively and display appropriate links based on authentication status (logged in or not).

title: Verify Localization to Turkish Language
description: Ensure all UI text content throughout the platform is presented in Turkish as required.

steps.description: Navigate through main pages, user dashboard, admin panel, error messages, buttons, and notifications.
Verify all visible text content is correctly translated and displayed in Turkish.

title: Data Integrity of Prisma ORM Models
description: Verify database schema matches Prisma schema ensuring relational consistency and data integrity for User, Product, Plan, Trial, Subscription, and Payment models.

steps.description: Insert test data for all models including relationships.
Verify that data persists correctly without integrity violations and relations between entities behave as expected.

title: Utility Functions Output Verification
description: Verify utility functions for currency formatting, date formatting, and remaining days calculation produce expected and accurate results.

steps.description: Call currency formatting with various numbers and currencies.
Verify output currency strings are formatted according to locale and currency conventions.
Call date formatting utility with different dates.
Verify output dates match expected readable formats.
Call remaining days calculation for various trial start/end dates.
Verify returned remaining days count is correct including edge cases (e.g. zero days left, negative values).
